page.title_en: The Olon Nuur inscription (Translation of D. Bayar, R. Munkhtulga, S. Khurelsukh)

line.tr: En elig čur önčin: kegü: qaz-[γantïm]
line.kz: Ен еліг чұр өшін: кегі: қаз тұрғыздым
line.en: [I have succeeded in] taking revenge on behalf of En Elig Čur,
[I have erected] the row, stone, house and property.
